instructions.text: Welcome to a 20-minute yoga stretch session for runners and office workers
Begin in a comfortable seated position, take deep breaths for relaxation
Neck Stretch: Gently tilt your head side to side, holding each stretch for 15 seconds
Shoulder Rolls: Roll your shoulders forward and backward to release tension
Cat-Cow Stretch: Flow between cat and cow poses to warm up the spine
Downward Dog: Stretch your hamstrings, calves, and back
Forward Fold: Reach for your toes and let your hamstrings relax
Low Lunge Stretch (Right Leg): Stretch your hip flexors and quads
Low Lunge Stretch (Left Leg): Switch sides for a balanced stretch
Seated Forward Fold: Extend your legs and fold forward to stretch your hamstrings
Butterfly Stretch: Open your hips by pressing your knees toward the ground
Seated Spinal Twist (Right Side): Twist gently to release tension in the back
Seated Spinal Twist (Left Side): Switch sides for a balanced stretch
Figure Four Stretch (Right Leg): Cross your ankle over your knee to open your hips
Figure Four Stretch (Left Leg): Switch sides for symmetry
Reclining Hamstring Stretch (Right Leg): Use a strap or hands to deepen the stretch
Reclining Hamstring Stretch (Left Leg): Switch sides
Supine Twist (Right Side): Release tension in the spine
Supine Twist (Left Side): Switch sides
Final Relaxation: Lie in Savasana, breathe deeply, and let go of tension
Thank yourself for taking time to stretch and care for your body
